content:
gloves are worked with a double strand of thread throughout note puritan was sold in more than one put-up yardage range given above is for 175yd balls - 250yd balls
**materials ** * the famous puritan crochet cotton article 40 *or* de luxe quality crochet cotton article 346 3 balls flamingo or color desired * 38 pearl beads * steel crochet hook no 00 originally published in 1954
